summary.span: 管理用户配置文件数据和设置。

span.span: Manages user profile data and settings.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 配置文件用于存储和检索数据源，如数据库中的用户设置。The ASP.NET profile is used to store and retrieve user settings in a data source such as a database. 使用访问用户配置文件属性与当前。The user profile is accessed using the property of the current . 使用配置文件提供程序管理配置文件信息和属性值。Profile information and property values are managed using a profile provider. 类用于管理配置文件设置，用户配置文件，搜索并删除不再使用的用户配置文件。The class is used to manage profile settings, search for user profiles, and delete user profiles that are no longer in use. 类提供静态方法和属性，可通过引用访问应用程序代码中的类。The class provides static methods and properties that can be accessed by referencing the class in your application code. 有关示例，请参阅本主题中的示例部分和主题中的其他示例的成员类。For an example, see the Example section in this topic and additional examples in the topics for members of the class. 默认情况下，为所有 ASP.NET 应用程序禁用用户配置文件。By default, the user profile is disabled for all ASP.NET applications. 若要启用的用户配置文件，请设置`enabled`为 true，如下面的示例中所示的配置元素的属性。To enable the user profile, set the `enabled` attribute of the configuration element to true, as shown in the following example. ``` ``` 有关用户配置文件的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 配置文件属性概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/89439440-92ea-48c3-a4bd-dea40307899d)。For more information about the user profile, see [ASP.NET Profile Properties Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/89439440-92ea-48c3-a4bd-dea40307899d). 配置文件提供程序用于存储和检索用户配置文件中的属性。A profile provider is used to store and retrieve properties in the user profile. .NET Framework 包括在 SQL Server 数据库中存储用户配置文件属性的类。The .NET Framework includes a class that stores user profile properties in a SQL Server database. 一个实例名为`AspNetSqlProvider`作为默认配置文件提供程序的计算机配置中指定。A instance named `AspNetSqlProvider` is specified in the machine configuration as the default profile provider. `AspNetSqlProvider`实例连接到本地 Web 服务器上的 SQL Server 数据库。The `AspNetSqlProvider` instance connects to the SQL Server database on the local Web server. 您可以指定连接到另一台 SQL 服务器作为默认配置文件提供程序使用的配置元素和`defaultProvider`配置元素，如下面的示例中所示的属性。You can specify a that connects to another SQL Server as the default profile provider by using the configuration element and the `defaultProvider` attribute of the configuration element, as shown in the following example. ``` ``` ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示使用的 ASP.NET 页类来管理不活动配置文件。The following code example shows an ASP.NET page that uses the class to manage inactive profiles. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例包含一个文本框，用于接受用户输入，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example contains a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). summary.span: 获取或设置要存储和检索其配置文件信息的应用程序的名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the application for which to store and retrieve profile information.

value.span: 要存储和检索其配置文件信息的应用程序的名称。

span.span: The name of the application for which to store and retrieve profile information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性以将配置文件信息与不同的应用程序相关联。The uses the property to associate profile information with different applications. 这使多个应用程序可以使用相同的数据库来存储用户信息而无需重复的用户之间发生冲突。This enables multiple applications to use the same database to store user information without running into conflicts between duplicate users. 多个 ASP.NET 应用程序可以通过指定相同的值中使用相同的用户数据库属性。Multiple ASP.NET applications can use the same user database by specifying the same value in the property. 可以以编程方式设置属性，或者可以在设置以声明方式在 Web 应用程序的配置文件中使用`applicationName`属性。The property can be set programmatically, or it can be set declaratively in the configuration file for the Web application by using the `applicationName` attribute. 如果没有为指定值`applicationName`属性中的 Web 应用的配置文件，则.NET Framework 附带的配置文件提供程序使用ASP.NET 应用程序的属性值。If a value is not specified for the `applicationName` attribute in the configuration file for the Web application, then the profile providers included with the .NET Framework use the property value for ASP.NET applications. 对于非 ASP.NET 应用程序，默认值是属性值，不带文件扩展名。For non-ASP.NET applications, the default value is the property value, without the file extension. 属性公开属性的默认配置文件提供程序。The property exposes the property of the default profile provider. 使用指定的默认配置文件提供程序`defaultProvider`配置元素的属性。The default profile provider is specified using the `defaultProvider` attribute of the configuration element. 如果用户配置文件包含由不同默认提供程序的配置文件提供程序的属性，它们可能会配置具有不同的应用程序名称。If the user profile contains properties that are managed by a profile provider other than the default provider, they may be configured with a different application name. 若要访问非默认的提供程序的配置文件提供程序的应用程序名称，获取对使用的配置文件提供程序的引用属性和访问直接的提供程序的属性。To access the application name of a profile provider other than the default provider, obtain a reference to the profile provider using the property and access the property of the provider directly. > [!CAUTION] > 因为一个默认配置文件提供程序实例用于所有服务的请求对象，可以有多个请求同时执行，并尝试设置属性值。Because a single default profile provider instance is used for all of the requests served by an object, you can have multiple requests executing concurrently and attempting to set the property value. 属性不是线程安全的多个写入操作，且不断变化属性值可能会导致多个用户的应用程序的意外行为。The property is not thread safe for multiple writes, and changing the property value can result in unexpected behavior for multiple users of an application. 建议您避免编写代码，使用户能够设置属性除非你需要它。It is recommended that you avoid writing code that allows users to set the property unless you require it. 应用程序的示例情况属性可能需要是管理多个应用程序的配置文件数据的管理应用程序。An example of an application where setting the property may be required is an administrative application that manages profile data for multiple applications. 此类应用程序应在单用户应用程序并不是 Web 应用程序。Such an application should be a single-user application and not a Web application. ## Examples 下面的配置文件摘录显示了 ASP.NET 应用程序的 Web.config 文件的部分中的元素。The following configuration file excerpt shows the element in the section of the Web.config file for an ASP.NET application. 它将应用程序的默认配置文件提供程序设置为实例并设置到`MyApplication`。It sets the application's default profile provider to a instance and sets the to `MyApplication`. ``` ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指示是否为应用程序启用了自动保存用户配置文件。The property indicates whether automatic saving of the user profile is enabled for the application. 如果启用自动保存，则对象会引发事件并调用方法期间ASP.NET 页执行结束时的事件。If automatic saving is enabled, the object raises the event and calls the method during the event at the end of the execution of an ASP.NET page. 属性使用设置`automaticSaveEnabled`的 ASP.NET 应用程序的 Web.config 文件中的元素的属性。The property is set using the `automaticSaveEnabled` attribute of the element in the Web.config file for an ASP.NET application. ## Examples 下面的配置文件摘录显示了 ASP.NET 应用程序的 Web.config 文件的部分中的元素。The following configuration file excerpt shows the element in the section of the Web.config file for an ASP.NET application. 它指定到的应用程序的默认配置文件提供程序实例并设置`automaticSaveEnabled`属性为`true`。It specifies the application's default profile provider to a instance and sets the `automaticSaveEnabled` attribute to `true`. ``` ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法用于从指定的应用程序的数据源中删除未使用的配置文件数据`applicationName`配置文件中的属性。The method is used to remove unused profile data from the data source for the application specified by the `applicationName` attribute in the configuration file. 使用`authenticationOption`参数来指定是否仅匿名配置文件，仅经过身份验证配置文件或要搜索的所有配置文件。Use the `authenticationOption` parameter to specify whether you want only anonymous profiles, only authenticated profiles, or all profiles to be searched. 搜索的配置文件，所有与配置文件当天或之前指定发生这种情况`userInactiveSinceDate`删除参数值。Of the searched profiles, any profile with a that occurs on or before the specified `userInactiveSinceDate` parameter value is deleted. 方法调用的默认配置文件提供程序的方法。The method calls the method of the default profile provider. 使用指定的默认配置文件提供程序`defaultProvider`配置元素的属性。The default profile provider is specified using the `defaultProvider` attribute of the configuration element. 如果用户配置文件包含由不同默认提供程序的配置文件提供程序的属性，不会删除其他数据源中的配置文件信息。If the user profile contains properties that are managed by a profile provider other than the default provider, the profile information in the other data source is not deleted. 若要删除不活动配置文件管理的非默认的提供程序的配置文件提供程序，获取对使用的配置文件提供程序的引用属性并调用提供者直接方法。To delete inactive profiles that are managed by a profile provider other than the default provider, obtain a reference to the profile provider using the property and call the method of the provider directly. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示了 ASP.NET 页面，用于管理不活动配置文件。The following code example shows an ASP.NET page that manages inactive profiles. 提供了一个按钮来删除未使用指定的天数并因此被视为处于非活动状态的所有配置文件。A button is provided to delete all profiles that have been unused for the specified number of days and are therefore considered inactive. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例包含一个文本框，用于接受用户输入，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example contains a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法中删除所有个人资料信息和对指定的用户配置文件的属性`username`为指定数据源的。The method deletes all profile information and properties for the user profile for the specified `username` from the data source for the specified . 方法调用要执行删除操作的默认配置文件提供程序的方法。The method calls the method of the default profile provider to perform the delete operation. 使用指定的默认配置文件提供程序`defaultProvider`配置元素的属性。The default profile provider is specified using the `defaultProvider` attribute of the configuration element. 如果用户配置文件包含由不同默认提供程序的配置文件提供程序的属性，则不会删除。If the user profile contains properties that are managed by a profile provider other than the default provider, they are not deleted. 若要删除由不同默认提供程序的配置文件提供程序的配置文件属性，获取对使用的配置文件提供程序的引用属性并调用提供者直接方法。To delete profile properties that are managed by a profile provider other than the default provider, obtain a reference to the profile provider using the property and call the method of the provider directly. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示了 ASP.NET 页面，用于管理不活动配置文件。The following code example shows an ASP.NET page that manages inactive profiles. 单个配置文件选择要删除时调用方法。The method is called when a single profile is selected to be deleted. 是否将配置文件视为处于非活动状态基于为指定的日期`userInactiveSinceDate`参数值传递给方法。Whether a profile is considered inactive is based on the date specified for the `userInactiveSinceDate` parameter value passed to the method. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例包含一个文本框，用于接受用户输入，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example contains a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将返回为其配置文件的用户名匹配所提供的配置文件信息的列表`usernameToMatch`已配置的参数值。The method returns a list of profile information for which the profile user name matches the supplied `usernameToMatch` parameter value of the configured . 使用`authenticationOption`参数来指定是否仅匿名配置文件，仅经过身份验证配置文件或要搜索的所有配置文件。Use the `authenticationOption` parameter to specify whether you want only anonymous profiles, only authenticated profiles, or all profiles to be searched. 请注意，配置文件提供程序可能支持的通配符字符`usernameToMatch`参数。Note that your profile provider may support wildcard characters in the `usernameToMatch` parameter. 例如，方法类支持的通配符字符`usernameToMatch`参数。For example, the method of the class supports wildcard characters in the `usernameToMatch` parameter. 返回的结果受到`pageIndex`和`pageSize`参数。The results returned by are constrained by the `pageIndex` and `pageSize` parameters. `pageSize`参数标识的最大数目对象中返回。The `pageSize` parameter identifies the maximum number of objects to return in the . `pageIndex`参数标识要返回; 的结果页 0 标识的第一页。The `pageIndex` parameter identifies which page of results to return; zero identifies the first page. `totalRecords`参数是`out`参数设置为指定的应用程序的非活动状态的用户配置文件的总数`applicationName`属性中配置文件中，根据所提供`authenticationOption`。The `totalRecords` parameter is an `out` parameter that is set to the total number of inactive user profiles for the application specified by the `applicationName` attribute in the configuration file, based on the supplied `authenticationOption`. 例如，如果有已配置的 13 个用户`applicationName`，并`pageIndex`值为 1`pageSize`为 5，返回将包含第六到第十个配置文件。For example, if there are 13 users for the configured `applicationName`, and the `pageIndex` value is 1 with a `pageSize` of 5, the returned will contain the sixth through the tenth profiles. `totalRecords`参数将设置为 13。The `totalRecords` parameter will be set to 13. 方法调用的默认配置文件提供程序的方法。The method calls the method of the default profile provider. 使用指定的默认配置文件提供程序`defaultProvider`配置元素的属性。The default profile provider is specified using the `defaultProvider` attribute of the configuration element. 如果用户配置文件包含由不同默认提供程序的配置文件提供程序的属性，则不会搜索的其他配置文件提供程序的数据源。If the user profile contains properties that are managed by a profile provider other than the default provider, the data source for the other profile provider is not searched. 若要查找由不同默认提供程序的配置文件提供程序的配置文件，获取对使用的配置文件提供程序的引用属性并调用提供者直接方法。To find profiles that are managed by a profile provider other than the default provider, obtain a reference to the profile provider using the property and call the method of the provider directly. ## Examples 下面的代码示例允许用户提供`usernameToMatch`值和一个和检索配置文件的任何匹配的配置文件信息。The following code example allows a user to supply a `usernameToMatch` value and a and retrieves profile information for any matching profiles. 该示例允许用户指定是否以独占方式返回不活动配置文件。The example allows the user to specify whether to return inactive profiles exclusively. 如果用户指定仅不活动配置文件方法是调用; 否则为调用方法。If the user specifies only inactive profiles, the method is called; otherwise, the method is called. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例包含一个文本框，用于接受用户输入，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example contains a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法用于从指定的应用程序的所有未使用的用户配置文件的数据源中检索配置文件信息`applicationName`配置文件中的属性。The method is used to retrieve profile information from the data source for all unused user profiles for the application specified by the `applicationName` attribute in the configuration file. 使用`authenticationOption`参数来指定是否仅匿名配置文件，仅经过身份验证配置文件或要搜索的所有配置文件。Use the `authenticationOption` parameter to specify whether you want only anonymous profiles, only authenticated profiles, or all profiles to be searched. 搜索的配置文件，将返回所有具有当天或之前指定发生这种情况`userInactiveSinceDate`参数值。Of the searched profiles, any profile is returned that has a that occurs on or before the specified `userInactiveSinceDate` parameter value. 可以检索的数据使用的重载，以页中的非活动用户配置文件的个人资料信息采用其他方法`pageIndex`和`pageSize`参数。You can retrieve profile information for inactive user profiles in pages of data using the overload for the method that takes additional `pageIndex` and `pageSize` parameters. 方法调用的默认配置文件提供程序的方法。The method calls the method of the default profile provider. 使用指定的默认配置文件提供程序`defaultProvider`配置元素的属性。The default profile provider is specified using the `defaultProvider` attribute of the configuration element. 如果用户配置文件包含由不同默认提供程序的配置文件提供程序的属性，则不会搜索的其他配置文件提供程序的数据源。If the user profile contains properties that are managed by a profile provider other than the default provider, the data source for the other profile provider is not searched. 若要查找由不同默认提供程序的配置文件提供程序管理的未使用配置文件，获取对使用的配置文件提供程序的引用属性并调用提供者直接方法。To find unused profiles that are managed by a profile provider other than the default provider, obtain a reference to the profile provider using the property and call the method of the provider directly. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示了 ASP.NET 页面，用于管理不活动配置文件。The following code example shows an ASP.NET page that manages inactive profiles. 提供了一个按钮来删除非活动状态的所有配置文件。A button is provided to delete all inactive profiles. 是否将配置文件视为处于非活动状态基于为指定的日期`userInactiveSinceDate`参数。Whether a profile is considered inactive is based on the date specified for the `userInactiveSinceDate` parameter. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例包含一个文本框，用于接受用户输入，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example contains a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). 的结果页 0 标识的第一页。The `pageIndex` parameter identifies which page of results to return; zero identifies the first page. `totalRecords`参数是`out`参数设置为已配置的非活动状态的用户配置文件的总数`applicationName`根据所提供`authenticationOption`。The `totalRecords` parameter is an `out` parameter that is set to the total number of inactive user profiles for the configured `applicationName`, based on the supplied `authenticationOption`. 例如，如果有已配置的 13 个用户`applicationName`，并`pageIndex`值是一个具有`pageSize`为 5，返回将包含第六到第十个配置文件。For example, if there are 13 users for the configured `applicationName`, and the `pageIndex` value is one with a `pageSize` of 5, the returned will contain the sixth through the tenth profiles. `totalRecords`参数将设置为 13。The `totalRecords` parameter will be set to 13. 方法调用的默认配置文件提供程序的方法。The method calls the method of the default profile provider. 使用指定的默认配置文件提供程序`defaultProvider`配置元素的属性。The default profile provider is specified using the `defaultProvider` attribute of the configuration element. 如果用户配置文件包含由不同默认提供程序的配置文件提供程序的属性，则不会搜索的其他配置文件提供程序的数据源。If the user profile contains properties that are managed by a profile provider other than the default provider, the data source for the other profile provider is not searched. 若要查找由不同默认提供程序的配置文件提供程序的配置文件，获取对使用的配置文件提供程序的引用属性并调用提供者直接方法。To find profiles that are managed by a profile provider other than the default provider, obtain a reference to the profile provider using the property and call the method of the provider directly. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示所有已配置的配置文件的配置文件信息`applicationName`中的数据页。The following code example displays profile information for all of the profiles for the configured `applicationName` in pages of data. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法用于从指定的应用程序的数据源检索的所有未使用的用户配置文件计数`applicationName`配置文件中的属性。The method is used to retrieve a count of all of the unused user profiles from the data source for the application specified by the `applicationName` attribute in the configuration file. 使用`authenticationOption`参数来指定是否仅匿名配置文件，仅经过身份验证配置文件或要搜索的所有配置文件。Use the `authenticationOption` parameter to specify whether you want only anonymous profiles, only authenticated profiles, or all profiles to be searched. 搜索的配置文件，所有配置文件进行计数的具有当天或之前指定发生这种情况`userInactiveSinceDate`参数值。Of the searched profiles, all profiles are counted that have a that occurs on or before the specified `userInactiveSinceDate` parameter value. ## Examples 下面的代码示例允许用户查看和删除基于搜索条件的活动和非活动配置文件的信息。The following code example allows a user to view and delete information for active and inactive profiles based on search criteria. 使用的结果显示的不活动配置文件计数方法。A count of inactive profiles is displayed using the results of the method. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例包含一个文本框，用于接受用户输入，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example contains a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性引用所有启用的应用程序的配置文件提供程序，包括提供程序添加的计算机配置和所有 Web.config 文件中添加提供程序。The property references all of the profile providers enabled for an application, including providers added in the machine configuration and providers added in all Web.config files. 您可以控制哪个配置文件提供程序可用于应用程序配置文件中使用的部分的元素。You can control which profile providers are available for an application using the element of the section in the configuration file. 例如，以下 Web.config 文件中删除父配置文件中指定的配置文件提供程序并将添加为应用程序的配置文件提供程序的实例。For example, the following Web.config file removes the profile providers specified in parent configuration files and adds a instance as the profile provider for the application. ``` ``` 指定时部分，您必须指定默认提供程序通过设置`defaultProvider`属性。When specifying the section, you must specify a default provider by setting the `defaultProvider` attribute. 如果未在 Web.config 文件中指定一个部分，使用计算机配置中的值和名为 AspNetSqlProvider 实例建立为默认提供程序。If you do not specify a section in your Web.config file, the values from the machine configuration are used and the instance named AspNetSqlProvider is established as the default provider. 你可以获取从提供程序的强类型化的引用通过按名称索引的配置文件提供程序并将其强制转换为所需的类型的集合。You can obtain a strongly typed reference to a provider from the collection by indexing the profile provider by name and casting it as the desired type. ## Examples 下面的代码示例列出了为应用程序和其各自的类型启用的提供程序。The following code example lists the providers enabled for an application and their respective types.
